description.para: Coefficients of the QCD $\beta$ function.

NLO coefficient of the QCD $\beta$ function.
NNLO coefficient of the QCD $\beta$ function.
NNNLO coefficient of the QCD $\beta$ function.

description.para: Coefficients of the QED $\beta_{QED}$ function.

briefdescription.para: LO coefficient of the QED $\beta$ function.

the number of active charged leptons

description.para: Small numbers used for cutoffs, integration accuracies, etc.
Definitions for recurrent constants.
The SU(3) Casimir's.
Quark electric charges and their square.
Conversion factor from GeV-2 to pb.
Value of the mass of the Z boson and its width in GeV taken from: http://pdg.lbl.gov/2018/listings/rpp2018-list-z-boson.pdf.
Value of the mass of the W bosons and their width in GeV taken from: http://pdg.lbl.gov/2018/listings/rpp2018-list-w-boson.pdf.
Value of the mass of the proton in GeV taken from: http://pdg.lbl.gov/2018/reviews/rpp2018-rev-phys-constants.pdf.
Value of sin2W in the MSbar scheme taken from: http://pdg.lbl.gov/2018/reviews/rpp2018-rev-phys-constants.pdf.
Value of GF in GeV-2 taken from: http://pdg.lbl.gov/2018/reviews/rpp2018-rev-phys-constants.pdf.
Absolute value of the CMK matrix elements and their square taken from: http://pdg.lbl.gov/2018/reviews/rpp2018-rev-ckm-matrix.pdf.

memberdef.name: CMK
memberdef.initializer: = {Vud, Vus, Vub, Vcd, Vcs, Vcb, Vtd, Vts, Vtb}

memberdef.name: CKM2
memberdef.initializer: = {Vud2, Vus2, Vub2, Vcd2, Vcs2, Vcb2, Vtd2, Vts2, Vtb2}

simplesect.para: A map of DglapObject objects, one for each possible nf

description.para: Collection of functions that build a Dglap object used to perform the DGLAP evolution of distributions or operators.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::map< int, DglapObjects > const &DglapObj, std::function< std::map< int, double >(double const &, double const &)> const &InDistFunc, double const &MuRef, int const &PerturbativeOrder, std::function< double(double const &)> const &Alphas, int const &nsteps=10)
memberdef.name: BuildDglap

param.type: std::function< std::map< int, double >(double const &, double const &)> const &

briefdescription.para: The BuildDglap function builds the actual dglap object that performs the DGLAP evolution for distributions.

parameterdescription.para: structure with the coefficients of the perturbative objects
the distributions at the reference scale
the perturbative order of the evolution
the function returning the strong coupling
the number of steps of the ODE solver (default: 10).

simplesect.para: A unique pointer to a Dglap object

memberdef.argsstring: (std::map< int, DglapObjects > const &DglapObj, double const &MuRef, int const &PerturbativeOrder, std::function< double(double const &)> const &Alphas, int const &nsteps=10)
memberdef.name: BuildDglap

briefdescription.para: The BuildDglap function builds the actual dglap object that performs the DGLAP evolution for operators.

parameterdescription.para: structure with the coefficients of the perturbative objects
the perturbative order of the evolution
the function returning the strong coupling
the number of steps of the ODE solver (default: 10).

simplesect.para: A unique pointer to a Dglap object

description.para: Coefficients of the F anomalous dimension. The expressions are taken from eq. (58) https://arxiv.org/pdf/1705.07167.pdf.

sectiondef.header: Cusp anomalous dimension. Coefficients of the

description.para:
K anomalous dimension. The expressions up to O(s3) are taken from eq. (59) https://arxiv.org/pdf/1705.07167.pdf. While the expressions at are taken from O(s4) from eqs. (4.1) and (4.2) of https://arxiv.org/pdf/1805.09638.pdf. A better approximation to the O(s4) is found in https://arxiv.org/pdf/1912.12920v2.pdf.
All the expressions do not include an overall factor CF or CA.

briefdescription.para: s2 term
s3 term
s4 term

detaileddescription.para: s4 correction to the gluon anonalous dimension (neglected for now).

memberdef.name: InitializeGpdObjects

briefdescription.para: The InitializeGPDObjects function precomputes the perturbative coefficients of unpolarised GPD evolution kernels and store them into a 'DglapObjects' structure. GPDs are assumed to be continuous over heavy-quark thresholds.

parameterdescription.para: the switch for the computation of the evolution operator (default: false)

simplesect.para: A map of DglapObject objects, one for each possible nf

simplesect.para: possible values of vl: LOW = No informative and warning messages are displayed. Error messages are printed anyway MEDIUM = No informative messages are displayed. Warning and error messages are printed HIGH = All messages are displayed

briefdescription.para: Function that prints the APFEL++ banner on screen. Effective according to the verbosity level.

description.para: These functions solve the ordinary differential equation (ODE):
dy / dt = f(t,y)
where:
dy = rk4(f(t,y))
so differentiation between lower and upper:
y += dy(t,y,dt)
U is the type of the 'y' object.

memberdef.type: std::function< U(double const &, U const &, double const &)>
memberdef.definition: std::function<U(double const&, U const&, double const&)> apfel::rk4

simplesect.para: the function tha returns the step

description.para: Collection of functions to rotate distributions from the QCD evolution basis to the phsycal basis and back. Specifically, the QCD evolution basis is:
while the physical basis is:
{ t, b, c, s, u, d, g, d, u, s, c, b, t}

briefdescription.para: Rotation matrix from the QCD evolution to the physical basis. Inverse of RotPhysToQCDEv.
Rotation matrix from the QCD evolution to the physical basis for the full bases. Inverse of RotPhysToQCDEvFull.
Rotation matrix from the physical to the QCD evolution basis. Inverse of RotQCDEvToPhys.
Rotation matrix from the physical to the QCD evolution basis for the full bases. Inverse of RotQCDEvToPhysFull.
Rotation from the physical to the QCD evolution basis.

parameterdescription.para: the map in the physical basis

simplesect.para: The map in the QCD evolution basis

description.para: Harmonic polylogarithms up to weight five

upper bound of the weight index requested

simplesect.para: This is just a suitably formatted wrapper of the original fortran function (see src/kernel/hplog.f) to facilitate the call of the harmonic logarithms from a C++ code.

memberdef.name: apf_hplog_

description.para: Collection of special functions needed in the evaluation of some expressions.

briefdescription.para: Real dilogarithm $\mathrm{Li}_2(z)$.

simplesect.para: Implementation translated by R.Brun from CERNLIB DILOG function C332.

briefdescription.para: Function for the computation of the Nielsen's generalized dilogs.

simplesect.para: Implementation translated from CERNLIB WGPLG.

briefdescription.para: Function for the computation of the Harmonic polylogs up to weight 5.

simplesect.para: C++ adaptation of the FORTRAN implementation discussed in https://arxiv.org/pdf/1809.07084.pdf. The argument x is limited to the interval [0, sqrt(2)-1].

briefdescription.para: Function that returns the index to be used with unidimensional arrays returned by hplog_.
Function that returns the unpacked weights of the HPL given the input vector.

memberdef.name: InitializeF2NCObjectsMassive

briefdescription.para: The InitializeF2NCObjectsMassive precomputes the perturbative coefficients of coefficient functions for combination NC F2 in the massive scheme and store them in the 'StructureFunctionObjects' structure.

parameterdescription.para: the number of nodes of the grid in = Q2/M2 (default: 150)
the lower bound of the grid in (default: 0.001)
the upper bound of the grid in (default: 100000)
the interpolation degree on the grid in (default: 3)
the value of the parameter in the function ln(ln(/2)) used for the tabulation (default: 0.0005)

simplesect.para: A StructureFunctionObjects-valued function

memberdef.type: std::function< StructureFunctionObjects(double const &, std::vector< double > const &)>

description.para:
Collection of functions that initialise StructureFunctionObjects structure for the different kinds of structure functions available.
For now only Zero-Mass structure functions up to O(s) are implemented.

memberdef.type: std::function< StructureFunctionObjects(double const &, std::vector< double > const &)>
memberdef.argsstring: (Grid const &g, std::vector< double > const &Thresholds, double const &IntEps=1e-5)
memberdef.name: InitializeF2NCObjectsZMT

briefdescription.para: The InitializeF2NCObjectsZMT precomputes the perturbative coefficients of coefficient functions for NC F2 for SIA in the ZM scheme and store them in the 'StructureFunctionObjects' structure.

simplesect.para: A StructureFunctionObjects-valued function

memberdef.type: std::function< StructureFunctionObjects(double const &, std::vector< double > const &)>
memberdef.argsstring: (Grid const &g, std::vector< double > const &Thresholds, double const &IntEps=1e-5)
memberdef.name: InitializeFLNCObjectsZMT

briefdescription.para: The InitializeFLNCObjectsZMT precomputes the perturbative coefficients of coefficient functions for NC FL for SIA in the ZM scheme and store them in the 'StructureFunctionObjects' structure.

simplesect.para: A StructureFunctionObjects-valued function

memberdef.argsstring: (Grid const &g, std::vector< double > const &Thresholds, double const &IntEps=1e-5)

briefdescription.para: The InitializeF3NCObjectsZMT precomputes the perturbative coefficients of coefficient functions for NC xF3 for SIA in the ZM scheme and store them in the 'StructureFunctionObjects' structure.

description.para: Collection of functions that initialise TmdObjects structure for the perturbartive evolution and matching currently available.

memberdef.argsstring: (Grid const &g, std::vector< double > const &Thresholds, double const &IntEps=1e-5, bool const &nnnlo=true)
memberdef.name: InitializeTmdObjects

briefdescription.para: The InitializeTmdObjects function precomputes the perturbative coefficients required for the evolution and matching of TMD PDFs and FFs and store them into a 'TmdObjects' structure.

parameterdescription.para: switch to compute the NNNLO matching functions (default: true)

simplesect.para: A map DglapObject objects, one for each possible nf

memberdef.argsstring: (Grid const &g, std::vector< double > const &Thresholds, double const &IntEps=1e-5)
memberdef.name: InitializeTmdObjectsLite

briefdescription.para: As the InitializeTmdObjects but with the computation of the NNNLO corrections to the matching conditions set to zero. This saves much computation time usually unneded.

description.para: Collection of functions that build a TMD distributions (both PDFs and FF) as Set<Distribution>-valued functions. These functions perform evolution and matching either separately or alltogether. Also a function for the computation of the hard factors is provided.

memberdef.type: std::function< Set< Distribution >double const &, double const &, double const &)>
memberdef.definition: std::function<Set<Distribution>double const&, double const&, double const&)> apfel::BuildTmdPDFs
memberdef.argsstring: (std::map< int, TmdObjects > const &TmdObj, std::function< Set< Distribution >(double const &)> const &CollPDFs, std::function< double(double const &)> const &Alphas, int const &PerturbativeOrder, double const &Ci=1, double const &IntEps=1e-7)
memberdef.name: BuildTmdPDFs

briefdescription.para: Function that returns the matched and evolved TMD PDFs in b-space as functions of the final scale and rapidity. It assumes the zeta-prescription.

parameterdescription.para: the set of collinear PDFs to be matched

simplesect.para: Set<Distribution>-valued function of the impact parameter bT, the final renormalisation scale , and the final rapidity scale representing the evolved TMD PDFs

memberdef.type: std::function< Set< Distribution >double const &, double const &, double const &)>
memberdef.definition: std::function<Set<Distribution>double const&, double const&, double const&)> apfel::BuildTmdFFs
memberdef.argsstring: (std::map< int, TmdObjects > const &TmdObj, std::function< Set< Distribution >(double const &)> const &CollFFs, std::function< double(double const &)> const &Alphas, int const &PerturbativeOrder, double const &Ci=1, double const &IntEps=1e-7)
memberdef.name: BuildTmdFFs

briefdescription.para: Function that returns the matched and evolved TMD FFs in b-space as functions of the final scale and rapidity. It assumes the zeta-prescription.

parameterdescription.para: the set of collinear PDFs to be matched

simplesect.para: Set<Distribution>-valued function of the impact parameter bT, the final renormalisation scale , and the final rapidity scale representing the evolved TMD FFs

memberdef.argsstring: (std::map< int, TmdObjects > const &TmdObj, std::function< Set< Distribution >(double const &)> const &CollPDFs, std::function< double(double const &)> const &Alphas, int const &PerturbativeOrder, double const &Ci=1)
memberdef.name: MatchTmdPDFs

briefdescription.para: Function that returns the matched TMD PDFs in b-space. It assumes the zeta-prescription.

parameterdescription.para: the set of collinear PDFs to be matched

simplesect.para: Set<Distribution>-valued function of the impact parameter bT representing the matched TMD PDFs

memberdef.argsstring: (std::map< int, TmdObjects > const &TmdObj, std::function< Set< Distribution >(double const &)> const &CollPDFs, std::function< double(double const &)> const &Alphas, int const &PerturbativeOrder, double const &Ci=1)
memberdef.name: MatchTmdFFs

briefdescription.para: Function that returns the matched TMD FFs in b-space. It assumes the zeta-prescription.

parameterdescription.para: the set of collinear PDFs to be matched

simplesect.para: Set<Distribution>-valued function of the impact parameter bT representing the matched TMD FFs

memberdef.type: std::function< std::vector< double >double const &, double const &, double const &)>
memberdef.definition: std::function<std::vector<double>double const&, double const&, double const&)> apfel::EvolutionFactors
memberdef.argsstring: (std::map< int, TmdObjects > const &TmdObj, std::function< double(double const &)> const &Alphas, int const &PerturbativeOrder, double const &Ci=1, double const &IntEps=1e-7)
memberdef.name: EvolutionFactors

briefdescription.para: Function that returns the evolution factors for gluon and quarks.

simplesect.para: std::vector<double>-valued function of the impact parameter bT, the final renormalisation scale , and the final rapidity scale . The 0-th component contains the gluon evolution factor, the remaining 12, from 1 to 12, are all equal and represent the quark evolution factors.

memberdef.type: std::function< double(double const &, double const &, double const &)>
memberdef.definition: std::function<double(double const&, double const&, double const&)> apfel::QuarkEvolutionFactor
memberdef.argsstring: (std::map< int, TmdObjects > const &TmdObj, std::function< double(double const &)> const &Alphas, int const &PerturbativeOrder, double const &Ci=1, double const &IntEps=1e-7)
memberdef.name: QuarkEvolutionFactor

briefdescription.para: Function that returns the evolution factor for quarks.

simplesect.para: double-valued function of the impact parameter bT, the final renormalisation scale , and the final rapidity scale . It returns the quark evolution factor.

memberdef.type: std::function< double(double const &, double const &, double const &)>
memberdef.definition: std::function<double(double const&, double const&, double const&)> apfel::GluonEvolutionFactor
memberdef.argsstring: (std::map< int, TmdObjects > const &TmdObj, std::function< double(double const &)> const &Alphas, int const &PerturbativeOrder, double const &Ci=1, double const &IntEps=1e-7)
memberdef.name: GluonEvolutionFactor

briefdescription.para: Function that returns the evolution factor for the gluon.

simplesect.para: double-valued function of the impact parameter bT, the final renormalisation scale , and the final rapidity scale . It returns the gluon evolution factor.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string const &Process, std::map< int, TmdObjects > const &TmdObj, std::function< double(double const &)> const &Alphas, int const &PerturbativeOrder, double const &Cf=1)
memberdef.name: HardFactor

briefdescription.para: Function that returns the hard factor.

parameterdescription.para: the string corresponding to the process requested

simplesect.para: double-valued function of the final renormalisation scale

description.para: Collection of useful tools.

briefdescription.para: Return the number of active flavours at the scale Q given the (ordered) vector of thresholds.

simplesect.para: number of active flavours at Q

briefdescription.para: Utility function used by the heavy-quark initiated massive coefficient functions.

simplesect.para: Triangular function

briefdescription.para: Utility function for the computation of the electroweak charges, for both time-like and space-like virtualities (Reference: https://arxiv.org/pdf/hep-ph/9711387.pdf).

parameterdescription.para: absolute value the virtuality of the vector boson
the flavour selector (default: TOTAL, i.e. all flavours are computed)

simplesect.para: the std::vector of the electroweak charges

briefdescription.para: Utility function for the computation of the electroweak charges for Drell-Yan in narrow-width appriximation.

simplesect.para: the std::vector of the electroweak charges

briefdescription.para: Utility function that concatenates and sort the input vectors.

simplesect.para: a std::vector containing the sorted entries of 'v1' and 'v2'

briefdescription.para: Absolute value of the object T. In the case of a Distribution, this is computed like the squared mean average of the entries of the joint grid. In the case of a set of distributions, the minimum dabs over the distributions is returned.

simplesect.para: the absolute value

briefdescription.para: Function that computes the coefficients of the expansion of a product of n binomials with zero's in r.
Factorial of an integer.

memberdef.argsstring: (int const &PerturbativeOrder, double const &Q, double const &AlphaQCD, double const &AlphaQED, std::vector< double > const &Thresholds, QuarkFlavour const &Comp=TOTAL, bool const &NoCharges=false)
memberdef.name: GetSIATotalCrossSection

briefdescription.para: Function that computes the total cross section in a electron-positron annihilation process.

parameterdescription.para: value of the strong coupling at Q
value of the electromagnetic coupling at Q
component of the cross section, e.g. charm, bottom, etc. (default = TOTAL)
whether to exclude the sum over the charge of the active flavours (default = false)

simplesect.para: the total cross section (in nbarn)
The QCD corrections to the total cross section in a electron-positron annihilation process are taken from Phys.Lett. B259 (1991) 144150.

briefdescription.para: Enumerator for the logarithmic accuracy.

memberdef.type: const std::map< std::pair< int, int >, int >
memberdef.name: Gkj

briefdescription.para: The map between pair of indices corresponding to the position of the operator in the evolution matrix and its linear index.
Method which prints ConvolutionMap with cout <<.
Method which prints the double object with cout <<.
Overload the << operator to print the parameters of the grid.
Method which prints Interpolator with cout <<. This only prints the first subgrid and is supposed to be used for debugging purposes.
Method which prints Operator with cout <<. This only prints the Operator on the first subgrid and is supposed to be used for debugging purposes.
Method that prints QGrid with cout <<.
Method which prints SubGrid with cout <<.
Namespace for all APFEL++ functions and classes.
